Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: George Simpson
Reviews.Content: Works great, took pictures underwater, BUT the floater strap broke while I was jet skiing & almost lost it  ....... PS 16 gb flash is about 3000 pictures

Reviews.Title: Olympus Tough TG-830 iHS - Blue
Reviews.Author: BMidd
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a week in Hawaii. Used it every chance possible. Great shots in various lighting & even underwater. Dropped it once from about 3 feet onto cement, still works! Extra battery & memory cards in this kit are a great bonus & very handy.

Reviews.Title: Olympus Tough TG 830
Reviews.Author: Judith
Reviews.Content: Love it, so many options, easy to use and figure out. Great pictures, good for rainy days outside. All the extras made it a special value.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: clyde stansfield
Reviews.Content: Loved it..Not only for underwater but anywhere.  Great video quality too. Nice little camera & was a great price. I would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great!!!
Reviews.Author: Johanna Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: We got it last week and we will be using it this Saturday on our 8 day Caribbean cruise. :-)
